data.message: While i do appreciate the notification AT THE TOP OF MY PAGE on the day of a friends birthday...it truly is a pain in the behind when you keep reposting to me in notices and emails....ENOUGH ALREADY....i am adult and believe it or not, not matter how much you nag you are not my mother....so one notice on the day of at top of page is fine, but beyond that is truly beyond tolerable from you...(obnoxious)

replies.message: Hey Faleen. We hear your frustration. You can adjust what you're notified about via email by following the instructions in this Help Center article: http://bit.ly/2ugqZKQ. Please reach out with any additional questions or suggestions. -Elizabeth
